function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contagious diseases through global interlinkages and interdependencies","Impact":"Risk of widespread disease outbreaks and pandemics","Mitigation":"Implementing strategies for disease containment and prevention","Technologies":"Advanced biosecurity measures, contact tracing technology, and rapid testing systems","People":"Global population, particularly in high-density urban areas and densely populated regions","Owner":"Health authorities, governments, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Increased vulnerability to supply chain disruptions and fragility","Impact":"Risk of economic instability, resource shortages, and social unrest","Mitigation":"Developing resilient supply chain networks and diversifying sourcing strategies","Technologies":"Blockchain technology, machine learning for predictive analytics, and decentralized production systems","People":"Businesses, governments, and consumers","Owner":"Supply chain managers, policymakers, and industry leaders"},{"Description":"Social inequality and inherent brittleness in the current economic system","Impact":"Risk of marginalized communities facing heightened health and economic disparities","Mitigation":"Implementing policies for equitable access to healthcare, education, and economic opportunities","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying disparities, digital inclusion initiatives, and online education platforms","People":"Marginalized communities, vulnerable populations, and disadvantaged groups","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations, and community leaders"}]}
